title: Why am I not receiving hextech crates?

embed.description: Post with 2 views. My S- game with Twitch

body:
Hi. For about a week now I haven't received a hextech crate from a game. I have no idea why though; I play Blind Pick 90% of the time. I am level 33 and apparently you are supposed to receive a hextech crate when you score an S- on a character for the season.

Here's an example. I got an S- with Twitch. The game says I have an S-, and I haven't gotten a crate with Twitch yet. And yet, no crate?! Here are some images just to prove. https://imgur.com/a/1gTay Is my game bugged? Please help. Thanks!

replies.body: Do you have a chest available on your profile? You get one every week and they stack up to four, so if you've already earned all your chests you won't be able to get another one for a while.
I've just checked and yea it says the next available one is in a week. So looks like I have run out. Thanks for your help <3
